about_the_game:
Here is the 5 soundtracks of the game.

  • Crazy Horse - 90 seconds, .wav format.
  • It's the Time - 29 seconds, .wav format. It's one of the in-game action musics.
  • Let's Do - 61 seconds, .wav format.
  • We Are Close - 30 seconds, .wav format. It's one of the in-game action musics.
  • Welcomen - 65 seconds, .wav format.

Composed by Eren Aydin.

After you have downloaded this, you can find the soundtracks in your game's folder. Default is: /steamapps/common/Welcome to Princeland/

name: Welcome to Princeland - Soundtracks

Minimum:

  • Processor: Any processor.
  • Memory: 6000 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics card.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
